InstructionsActivity
AboutActivity
Once upon a time, there was an alien named Vince who lived in Venus.
His favorite food was vegetables but he could not grow them in Venus.
One day, he decided to take a trip to Planet Earth.
On Planet Earth, Vince snuck into a garden.
He looked to make sure no one was watching from the windows of the house. All he saw was a vase of flowers on the sill.
He slowly started pulling lettuce and carrots from the ground. He pulled green beans and tomatoes off the vines.
He placed each veggie carefully into his velvet sack, happily thinking how rich they were in vitamins and minerals. He only wished they had food like this on Venus!
He was just about finished when he heard a voice. "I'm going to pick some beans for supper," a woman said as she came out of the house.
Vince quickly vanished behind some tall stalks of corn.
"Hey, who's been stealing all my vegetables?" yelled the woman. "I'm going to find him right now!"
With that, she started searching the garden. He knew she would discover him if she got much closer. What was he going to do?
Looking over, Vince saw a rabbit hiding nearby. It must have heard the woman too, because it was lying low to the ground as if hiding.
The woman was coming closer by the second. Quickly, Vince grabbed the rabbit and pushed it out into the path, right into plain view.
"Hey!" yelled the woman, surprised. The rabbit immediately started to run. "Get back here!" The woman started to chase the rabbit.
Vince quickly ran the other way, towards his hidden vehicle. He got in and started it up right away.
Even though it just vibrated at first, it shot up into space almost immediately.
"Phew!" thought Vince, and he opened his sack excitedly to look once again at his variety of vegetables.
Mommy, Daddy, and I were sitting in front of the TV watching our favorite movie.
Suddenly, the face of a news reporter came onto the screen.
“This is a news flash from station KIVB. The local police are leading a search for a group of wild animals that have escaped from the zoo."
"Wow. How do you think they got out?" I asked my parents.
"Well, you see, my friend, Bob, here is a whiz at picking locks," there came a voice from the kitchen.
We all jumped and turned around to see a tiger in the middle of the kitchen floor.
A monkey on his back smiled and said, "Oh, Duke, anyone could do it." All of a sudden we heard a growl from the open refrigerator.
"Don't you guys have any meat in here?" A lion poked his head out from behind the door.
"Sorry, we're vegetarians. What do you animals want?" said the family.
"Well, we'd love some dinner for starters. And we need a place to hide until the cops stop looking for us," said the animals.
"What are you planning to do for the rest of your lives? Keep running from the police? They'll catch you eventually, you know," said the family.
"Not if you help us, they won't. Now, let's all sit down and start making a plan."
As the animals started talking with each other, I looked at my mom and dad. Boy, this was going to be a long night.
Once upon a time there was a cat named Alex.
Alex loved to play with his other cat friend Bruce.
Shiny bags were his favorite.
Alex liked climbing around.
One day, Alex and Bruce climbed outside to explore!
They got scared and decided to come back inside
Then they went back to playing with the shiny bag.
Finally after a long day Alex deserved some nice long rest.
There once was a bowl full of all kind of fruits.
There was an apple, an orange, a banana, a pumpkin, and even a lemon.
One day they all started to talk about what they wanted to be when they got out of the bowl. When banana got out of the bowl he wanted to become a banana split.
Orange wanted to be an orange juice.
Pumpkin said he wanted to become some delicious pumpkin pie.
Lemon finally said that he wanted be part of the best lemonade ever created.
Then they all turned to apple. “What do you want to be?” said banana. But she did not know.
New fruit came into the bowl like a strawberry, but then she left and apple was left alone again.
A peach also came into the bowl but was soon taken away just like strawberry.
Apple thought about becoming an apple pie but she did not want to copy pumpkin so she decided not to.
Then apple thought about becoming a caramel apple but that was too sweet.
On day finally someone took apple out of the fruit bowl and took her away.
She later discovered that she was given as a present to a teacher, and that made apple very happy.
by Tammy Kong
by Patrick Fedegan
by Jorge Rodriguez
